properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 10:45AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Tallahatchie River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tallahatchie River near Swan Lake
* from Tuesday February 11 until further notice.
* At 10 AM Tuesday the stage was...25.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 26.5 feet on Friday February 14.
* Flood stage is 26.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday February 11 and
continue to rise to near 26.5 feet by Friday February 14.
* At 27.0 feet...Farm land flooding is occurring near the river.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Wednesday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
